hooks.pre-push: yarn compile && yarn test && yarn lint

scripts.bootstrap: lerna run compile && lerna run --scope @label/cour-de-cassation bootstrap --stream && ./scripts/bootstrap.sh
scripts.build: lerna run build --stream && cp -r packages/generic/client/build/ packages/generic/backend/
scripts.deployPreProd: git pull && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn build && yarn startPreProd
scripts.startLocalClientDev: yarn compileClient && cd packages/generic/client && yarn start
scripts.upLocal: git pull && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn buildLocalDocker && yarn startLocalDocker
scripts.upPreProd: git pull && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn buildPreProdDocker && yarn startPreProdDocker
scripts.upPreProdRpvj: git pull && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn buildPreProdDockerRpvj && yarn startPreProdDockerRpvj
scripts.upProd: git pull && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn buildProdDocker && yarn startProdDocker
scripts.upProdRpvj: git pull && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn buildProdDockerRpvj && yarn startProdDockerRpvj
